Package org.rancore.annotation

Class RetryDemo

java.lang.Object
org.rancore.annotation.RetryDemo
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRetry
public class RetryDemo extends Object implements IRetry
This class demonstrates how to use the Retry annotation.

  • Method Details

    • retryMethod

      public void retryMethod() throws RetryFailedException
      Implementation of the method to retry. Should be declared in an interface. The class that defines the method must implement that interface.
      Specified by:
      retryMethod in interface IRetry
      Throws:
      RetryFailedException - Exception when the operation fails after a number of attempts.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)

      Demonstration of usage:

      • Create a proxy of the class that defines the method to retry.
      • Call method in a try-catch block
      • Catch RetryFailedException
      Parameters:
      args - args
